content:
After all that effort,
I might have enough to get those mere <color=#8AAB4B>5 branches</color>
needed for the fishing rod?
info: 莎莎关于制作钓竿_莎莎

content:
First, I'll dash under all the trees,
pick up all the branches that have already fallen to the ground,
I'm calling this the "Branch Zero Initiative"!
info: 莎莎关于制作钓竿_莎莎

content:
<color=#d3b037>{me}</color>,
Are you gathering materials for a fishing rod?
Let me share a little trick with you—
info: 莎莎关于制作钓竿_莎莎
